permissions: Admins can create missing rates. Non-admins can create a missing rate only if they are a manager member of the broker for the job customer.
side_effects: Creates the missing rate, links the service type unit of measure to the job, creates rates for related customer and broker tenders, and posts a developer notification.
validation_notes: job, service-type-unit-of-measure, currency-code, customer-price-per-unit, and trucker-price-per-unit are required. service type unit of measure must not already be related to the job. currency_code, customer_price_per_unit, and trucker_price_per_unit are validated for presence.

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure
flags.description: Service type unit of measure ID
